GMO DETECTIVES

DETECTION OF DOCUMENTED GENOME EDITS

HIGH PRECISION

Our assay offers high precision, capable of detecting subtle genetic modifications typical of new GMOs (NGT plants).

EFFICIENCY

Our assay can test multiple samples to detect multiple GM markers at once, drastically reducing time and costs.

SWISS INNOVATION

We are the first company in Switzerland to commercially focus on GMO detection.
